job.title: C# ERP Integrations Developer-Top Construction Org!
job.description: <p><strong><u>C# ERP Integrations Developer-Premier Construction Organization. (Contract) ; (50-70/hr)<br><br></u></strong></p><ul><li><strong>Interviewing immediately!!! </strong></li><li>100% Remote but must work in the Pacific Time Zone. Cannot sponsor now or in future, must be able to work 6-12+ Month Contract position. There is a chance this could extend and there is a chance of conversion depending on needs, etc. <u><strong>NO C2C!!!</strong></u></li></ul><p><strong><u>Day-To-Day</u>:<br><br></strong></p><ul><li>IT Support to ERP systems by analyzing and making necessary application changes. </li><li>Advises on technical roadmap for upcoming projects and initiatives, (state analysis, potential constraints, requirements gathering, GAP Analysis, automation, etc.)</li><li>Business process design and ERP application configuration</li><li>Design and develop tables for the application, generate reports, design modules and enhance systems effectively with proper debugging of applications and coding. (could involve new development as needed )</li></ul><p><strong><u>Requirements</u>:<br><br></strong></p><ul><li>5+ years of app-level development in Microsoft Stack: C#, .NET. This includes: REST APIs, JSON, XML, etc.</li><li>5+ years of hands-on experience with SQL Databases, SQL, T-SQL, SSIS, data migrations, etc. Including stored procedures and complex querying.</li><li>Experience with ERP integrations is ideal to go along with in-depth ERP knowledge. (ViewPoint is a huge plus)</li><li>Team Player, ability to properly communicate with non-technical team members and understand business requirements. Has a clear understanding of the business side along with the development side.</li><li>Experience with Mulesoft Integrations is a Huge Plus! <br></li></ul><strong>Desired Skills and Experience<br><br></strong>IT Support to ERP systems by analyzing and making necessary application changes. <br>Advises on the technical roadmap for upcoming projects and initiatives, (state analysis, potential constraints, requirements gathering, GAP Analysis, automation, etc.)<br>Business process design and ERP application configuration<br>Design and develop tables for the application, generate reports, design modules and enhance systems effectively with proper debugging of applications and coding. (could involve new development as needed )<br><br>Requirements:<br><br>5+ years of app-level development in Microsoft Stack: C#, .NET. This includes: REST APIs, JSON, XML, etc.<br><br>5+ years of hands-on experience with SQL Databases, SQL, T-SQL, SSIS, data migrations, etc. Including stored procedures and complex querying.<br><br>Experience with ERP integrations is ideal to go along with in-depth ERP knowledge. (ViewPoint is a huge plus)<br><br>Team Player, ability to properly communicate with non-technical team members and understand business requirements. Has a clear understanding of the business side along with the development side.<br><br>Experience with Mulesoft Integrations is a Huge Plus!
